keyphrase: Creativity can flourish in the absence of obligations
summary: When a person has fewer responsibilities, they may channel their energy into imaginative pursuits.

keyphrase: Idle time can lead to unexpected outcomes
summary: Lack of responsibilities can result in individuals engaging in activities that may not be productive.
Without assigned duties, individuals might seek alternative ways to occupy their time, sometimes leading to mischief.
When people are not held accountable, they might engage in actions they otherwise wouldn't.
